Detailed Description

Handling input and output streams of NetPBM images or YUV4MPEG2 frames: Manage stream information, read and write frames.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum cvl_io_stream_t
 

Type of an input or output stream.

Enumerator:
CVL_IO_STREAM_Y4M  A YUV4MPEG2 stream.
CVL_IO_STREAM_PNM  A NetPBM stream.

enum cvl_y4m_chroma_t
 

Type of chroma data.

Enumerator:
CVL_Y4M_CHROMA_UNKNOWN  Unknown chroma subsampling.
CVL_Y4M_CHROMA_420JPEG  4:2:0 with JPEG/MPEG-1 siting.
CVL_Y4M_CHROMA_444  4:4:4 (no subsampling).

enum cvl_y4m_interlacing_t
 

Type of interlacing.

Enumerator:
CVL_Y4M_INTERLACING_UNKNOWN  Unknown interlacing. Treated the same as no interlacing.
CVL_Y4M_INTERLACING_PROGRESSIVE  Progressive interlacing (= no interlacing).

Function Documentation

cvl_io_info_t* cvl_io_info_new (  void   ) 
 

Returns:
A new input/output information structure, with default values filled in.
Creates a new input/output information sructure.

void cvl_io_info_free (  cvl_io_info_t *  info  ) 
 

Parameters:
info The information structure.
Frees an input/output information structure. NULL pointers are accepted.

int cvl_io_info_frame_counter (  cvl_io_info_t *  info  ) 
 

Parameters:
info The io stream information.
Returns:
The frame counter.
Returns the number of frames that were read from or written to the stream assossiated with info.

cvl_io_stream_t cvl_io_info_stream_type (  cvl_io_info_t *  info  ) 
 

Parameters:
info The stream information.
Returns the stream type associated with info. This information may be unknown until after the first frame was read or written!

cvl_io_stream_t  stream_type
) 
 

Parameters:

cvl_y4m_chroma_t cvl_io_info_chroma (  cvl_io_info_t *  info  ) 
 

Parameters:
info The io stream information.
Returns the chroma subsampling type associated with info. Only has a meaning for CVL_IO_STREAM_Y4M streams. This information may be unknown until after the first frame was read or written!

cvl_y4m_chroma_t  chroma
)

int *  framerate1,
int *  framerate2
) 
 

Parameters:
info The io stream information.
framerate1 The divident of the framerate.
framerate2 The divisor of the framerate.

void cvl_io_info_link_output_to_input (  cvl_io_info_t *  output_info,
const cvl_io_info_t *  input_info
) 
 

Parameters:
output_info The output stream information.
input_info The input stream information.
Automatically get output information: the values in output_info that were not filled in will be automatically taken from input_info when they are needed. This saves some cvl_io_info_set_* calls.

bool cvl_io_read (  FILE *  f,
cvl_io_info_t *  input_info,
cvl_frame_t **  frame
) 
 

Parameters:
f The input stream.
input_info The input information.
frame The frame will be returned here.
Returns:
Success or error.
Reads a frame from an input stream. frame will be NULL when this function fails.

bool cvl_io_write (  FILE *  f,
cvl_io_info_t *  output_info,
const cvl_frame_t *  frame
) 
 

Parameters:
f The output stream.
output_info The output information.
frame The frame.
Returns:
Success or error.
Writes a frame to an output stream.

bool cvl_io_read_pnm (  FILE *  f,
cvl_frame_t **  frame
) 
 

Parameters:
f The stream to read the frame from, opened with mode "rb".
frame The frame.
Returns:
Success or error.
Load a frame from a stream in NetPBM format.

const cvl_frame_t *  frame
) 
 

Parameters:
f The stream to write the frame to, opened with mode "wb".
frame The frame.
Returns:
Success or error.
Saves a frame in NetPBM format.
